subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|rs=言12}}

; with goon and kan’on {{m|ja|が}} ({{m|ja|ぐわ}}):
# [[false]] [[word]]s, a [[lie]], a [[falsehood]] (same as {{m|ja|訛}})
# to [[change]]<!--かわる--><!--
# さめる, couldn't be sure of which sense-->
# to [[move]]<!--うごく-->
# [[suspicious]], [[questionable]]<!--あやしい-->; a suspicious thing said
# to [[lie]], speak falsely of<!--いつわる-->; [[deceit]], [[falsehood]]
; with goon {{m|ja|げ}}, kan’on {{m|ja|が}} ({{m|ja|ぐわ}}):
# to change (same as {{m|ja|譁}})
; with goon and kan’on {{m|ja|き}}:
# to [[lie]] (same as {{m|ja|詭}})
{{attn|ja|please review the definitions}}

subSections.title: Readings
